ygData.subject: Re: The "Frostbite" quest
ygData.msgSnippet: An idea. Barbarians can get a quest from snowflake.  And in this quest snowflake will lead them out to a hole in the ice.  Perhaps if you can get snowflake to
ygData.messageBody:
An idea.

Barbarians can get a quest from snowflake. And in this quest snowflake will
lead them out to a hole in the ice. Perhaps if you can get snowflake to
lead you the hole. You can stomp him out away from the guards. Haven't
tried this, but maybe it'll work.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jolith [mailto:jolith@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 2:27 PM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Quest] The "Frostbite" quest

From: Jolith <jolith@...>

Has anyone been able to complete the "Frostbite" quest?

In the Paladin temple one of the guards complains that a wolf named
"Frostbite" has stolen one of the sacred fish. Your quest is to locate the
wolf recover the body of the fish.

Locating the wolf is simple enough as he is the pet of one of the barbarian
fishing villages, but getting the fish from him is another matter.
Attacking him brings the local barbarians out after you and usually results
in death. Killing him gives a pelt, but no fish.

Anyone know how to recover the fish without getting a village of barbaians
after you?



Jolith
9th Level Half-Elf Paladin
Bound to Qeynos on Rodcet Nife
